title: What did the Advanced Course on Ecstasy and Non-Verbal Hypnosis in Russia teach?
first_phrase: In this part of the text, we delve into the Advanced Course on ecstasy therapy conducted in Russia. The main goal of the course was to deepen the techniques of inducing crisis and to introduce a specific framework called non-verbal hypnotism that uses sound and non-verbal communication to induce a hypnotic state. We also focus on magnetism techniques, Quantum and Hermetic paradigms, self-hypnosis exercises, and regression techniques. We explain the TAURUS technique and its benefits, and introduce the concept of Magnetic Circle and Magnetic Ecstasy, which are used to induce a physiological state and deeper transformation in the client.

last_phrase: In conclusion, exploring the world of nonverbal communication and hypnosis can lead to powerful physiological and psychological transformations. By inducing a state of ecstasis, working on the spine, and using techniques like the closure of senses and magnetic passes, one can tap into the body's own energy and transform their mental and physical state. It is important to remember that reactions vary from person to person, and working on different sides of the body can elicit different responses. By mixing symbolism and direct touch, one can create a tailored experience for each individual, leading to a deeper sense of self-awareness and personal growth.
